name: Eddie is a hero
description:
A short game of mine about Eddie Munson from Stranger Things Season 4.

It's about Eddie having revenge on Demobats after they killed him, killing them with his electric guitar while Master Of Puppets plays(sounds epic).

Sprites and whole  game made by me,music by METALLICA.

CONTROLS

W-Forward

A-Left

S-Down

D-Right

Hold Left Mouse Button To Kill a Demobat.

Collect Healers(green spawning crosses) To Heal Yourself.
